column4: hello, i'm a newbie who wants to switch from windows 98 to xubuntu. i'm on a 180mhz processor, 30mb ram, 8gb hd
ok, so what linux is best for me?
sadly, your best choice is a new computer. They are very cheap now. You don't need a very powerful processor; a sempron is fine.
you can run any Linux with your computer but only if you really feel comfortable with command line. You won't be able to run graphical stuff.
